```{python}
%%javascript
window.executePython = function(python) {
    return new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
        var callbacks = {
            iopub: {
                output: (data) => resolve(data.content.text.trim())
            }
        };
        Jupyter.notebook.kernel.execute(`${python}`, callbacks);    
    });
}
```
